translation: Non-injury, equanimity, contentment, austerity, beneficence, fame, and ill-fame—these different qualities of beings arise from Me alone.
commentary: 10.5 Noninjury? Equality eanimity? Satisfaction: contentment? Tapas austerity? Charity beneficence? Fame: fame? Disgrace illfame? Are they arise? emotions alities? of beings of beings? Mattah from Me? Eve alone? Pṛthagvidhaḥ of different kinds. Commentary Is non-injury to living beings in thought? word and deed. Is Samata that state in which there is neither Raga (like) nor Dvesha (dislike)? when one gets pleasant
